youtube.title: How Breastfeeding Works: The Biology of Lactation Explained
youtube.description: Discover the fascinating biological process behind breastfeeding. This video breaks down the anatomy of the breast, the role of alveoli, and how milk is produced and delivered to a baby. Perfect for students and curious minds! #biology #health #breastfeeding
